page.title: 20CREDITS _ THOSE INVOLVED
page.content: This block was prepared by children at the following schools : {Brinsworth Howarth Junior and {Infant School _}most of the work came from{Class 8,}a group of 4th. year junior children. Thanks also to{Andrew {Chapman, Samantha Green, Mark Lomas {and Craig Radford}from Class 7 for the work on{Brinsworth Switching Station. { Treeton C. of E. Aided Junior and {Infant School _}all of the junior children were involved in the project. {Brinsworth Comprehensive School. { (Thanks also to Helen Pearson, {Alison Powell and Lisa Tyler}pupils at Catcliffe J&I School for the work on {Catcliffe Glass Kiln). Photographers :{A.Jones, C.Allen. Work collected by{Mrs.A.Barry, {Mr.C.Beech and Mrs.P.Laverick. Many thanks to all - {Paul Tennyson (Co-ordinator).
